briefTitle: Biomarkers in Tissue Samples From Older Women With Breast Cancer
officialTitle: PIK3CA Mutation Status as a Biomarker in Elderly Women With Breast Cancer
primaryOutcomeMeasure: Breast cancer-free interval for patients with PIK3CA-mutated tumors
eligibilityCriteria:
* Participants with stage I breast cancer (T1N0M0) and estrogen-receptor status positive or unknown
* Patients underwent lumpectomy with negative margins and were clinically node-negative
